about_the_game:
"Coin Slot" is a coin pusher game where you can drop a large number of coins.

In the left slot, numbers are drawn every 0.1 seconds in a 3x3 grid. When the numbers align vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, coins are dispensed. Additionally, when a ball is dropped, it triggers an increase in the slot level.

The numbers that appear in the slot change based on the slot level. At level 1, numbers between 1 and 7 can appear, but at level 5, only the numbers 1 and 2 will appear.

To align 8 lines, it is essential to reach level 5.

Moreover, the slot stops for 0.5 seconds for each line that aligns.

A maximum of 960 coins can be dispensed by aligning 8 lines, providing an exciting coin drop experience.

This game features an auto-shoot function, and the interval between shots can be adjusted to as little as 0.01 seconds.
detailed_description:
"Coin Slot" is a coin pusher game where you can drop a large number of coins.

In the left slot, numbers are drawn every 0.1 seconds in a 3x3 grid. When the numbers align vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, coins are dispensed. Additionally, when a ball is dropped, it triggers an increase in the slot level.

The numbers that appear in the slot change based on the slot level. At level 1, numbers between 1 and 7 can appear, but at level 5, only the numbers 1 and 2 will appear.

To align 8 lines, it is essential to reach level 5.

Moreover, the slot stops for 0.5 seconds for each line that aligns.

A maximum of 960 coins can be dispensed by aligning 8 lines, providing an exciting coin drop experience.

This game features an auto-shoot function, and the interval between shots can be adjusted to as little as 0.01 seconds.
name: コインスロット

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 8th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel graphics UHD 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: It's a coin pusher game where you can drop a large number of coins. Try to line up the numbers to win coins!
